description:
The Bood Pressure Monitor is a reliable, safe and fast assistant to help you track your blood pressure information and heart pulse, as well as provide useful lifestyle tips for your health. 

The Bood Pressure Monitor app allows you to control your blood pressure, heart rate and other vital signs in a quick, easy, and safe manner. You can easily follow the evolution of your values, understand the meaning of your measurement values, determine if you are at a normal level, and get useful advice on how to improve your lifestyle for better health!

It can be challenging to find all of your blood pressure statistics in one app. The Bood Pressure Monitor can provide you with information on your blood pressure ranges, trends, and other relevant information.

The heart rate is also an important health indicator. You can measure and analyze your stress and anxiety levels with Bood Pressure Monitor. With our app, a pulse checker and heart rate monitor, you can keep track of your stress, anxiety, and emotions. It will assist you in analyzing your stress levels and taking care of your health.

Just use your phone - no specialized device needed!
In-depth analysis with waveform graphs
Health knowledge and insights by experts

DISCLAIMER: 
- The Bood pressure: Heart rate monitor App should not be used as a diagnostic tool for blood or heart diseases.
- The Bood pressure: Heart rate monitor App is not designed to be used in a medical emergency. If you require assistance, please contact your health care physician.
- The Bood pressure: Heart rate monitor App may cause the LED to flash excessively hot in some devices.

【VitalTide APP: Your Portable Health Data Manager, Making Health Management Easier】
In the fast-paced modern life, health management is often "squeezed out" by busyness—you can’t find paper and pen when you want to record your blood pressure, lack systematic data when you want to analyze blood glucose changes, and have no way to integrate multiple health indicators. To help you break through these troubles, VitalTide APP comes into being. It integrates the recording of multi-dimensional health indicators such as blood pressure, blood glucose and heart rate, and serves as your reliable health partner that you can rely on at any time with simple operations and clear data presentation.
Core Features: Comprehensive Coverage to Make Health Data "Traceable"
1. Accurate Recording: Every Measurement Has a Clear Record
● Blood Pressure Recording: Adapted to Daily Monitoring Scenarios  
Whether it is the basic blood pressure measurement after getting up in the morning, or irregular monitoring during work breaks, after exercise, etc., the APP has a convenient recording entrance. You can quickly save the data by manually entering the measured values, no complicated operations are required, and it is easy to track the fluctuation trend of blood pressure.
● Blood Glucose Recording: Distinguish Scenarios to Facilitate Diet Analysis  
For blood glucose management needs, an intuitive and easy-to-use dedicated interface is designed: it supports distinguishing between "pre-meal" and "post-meal" records to help you clearly sort out the correlation between diet and blood glucose changes.
2. Multi-Dimensional Coverage: Meet the Needs of Comprehensive Health Management
In addition to blood pressure and blood glucose, the APP also supports the recording of basic indicators such as heart rate, height and weight, and is also equipped with reference for healthy diet guidelines—from basic physiological data to daily diet suggestions, it covers your health management needs in one stop, eliminating the need to switch between multiple tools.
Disclaimer
VitalTide APP is only used as a tool for recording and organizing health data. It cannot replace medical equipment nor provide medical diagnosis or treatment advice. If you have any health discomfort, need to obtain professional medical opinions or make medical decisions, please be sure to consult a practicing doctor to ensure your health and safety.

VitalWalk - Track Every Step, Challenge Every Day!

VitalWalk is your go-to step tracking app that helps you monitor your daily steps and motivate you towards a healthier lifestyle. Whether at work, exercising, or walking, VitalWalk accurately records every step.

Key Features:

Step Tracking: Precisely track your daily steps, set goals, and stay motivated.
Bar Graph Display: Easily visualize your step trends with intuitive bar graphs, keeping you informed of your progress at a glance.
Mileage Medals: Earn different mileage medals based on your step count, encouraging you to continuously challenge yourself and reach new milestones.
User Leaderboard: Compete with friends and other users to see who can walk the most steps, adding a fun competitive edge to your fitness journey.

Join the VitalWalk and take a step towards better health today!

Do you often forget to record your blood pressure data?
Do you need reminders to measure your blood pressure and take medication on time?
Do you want a convenient tool to keep track of your health status anytime?

Introducing "Akso: Recording Health"! It's a powerful app that provides comprehensive blood pressure management and health reminder services for you.

Our goal is to help you easily record your blood pressure data, set health reminders, and keep track of your medications.

Key Features:
Blood Pressure Recording: Conveniently record your blood pressure data, including systolic and diastolic readings. You can view your historical records anytime.
Health Reminders: Set regular health reminders such as hydration reminders, blood pressure monitoring reminders, medication reminders, and more.
Medication Tracking: Easily record information about the medications you take, including medication names, types, and dosage times. Never miss a dose.
Abnormal Data Analysis: Monthly statistical reports on any abnormal blood pressure readings you may have, helping you understand your health.
Personalized Reminder Settings: Customize the timing, frequency, and content of your health reminders based on your preferences and needs. You can also personalize medication reminders according to your requirements.

We are dedicated to providing a user-friendly and comprehensive blood pressure tracking and health reminder app to help you better focus on and manage your health. Additionally, keeping track of your medications helps you better manage your medication regimen and maintain your well-being. Let's pursue a healthy lifestyle together and enjoy a better quality of life!

(Please note: This app is for reference and assistance only, and cannot replace medical advice or diagnosis. If you have any health concerns, please consult a doctor.)

Take control of your health – smarter, simpler, and more personal.

Vitaria helps you understand your body better with intelligent insights, AI Doctor Advice, and seamless HealthKit integration — all built with SwiftUI for a modern, smooth experience.

No more messy spreadsheets or disconnected trackers. Every health detail — from blood pressure to hydration — now lives in one secure, easy-to-use space designed with care.

What makes Vitaria different
- AI Doctor Advice – Receive personalized health insights powered by AI to better understand your daily trends and habits.
- HealthKit Integration – Sync your data automatically with Apple Health for a seamless experience across your devices.
- SwiftUI Experience – Enjoy a beautifully designed, fast, and accessible app built natively for iOS.
- Smart & Unified Tracking – Log blood pressure, blood sugar, heart rate, water intake, and medications — all in one app.
- Intelligent Insights – Visual trends, charts, and AI summaries help you see the bigger picture of your health journey.
- Reminders & Notes – Stay consistent with medication and hydration reminders, plus space for personal notes and observations.

Why users love Vitaria
- Simple, clean design that makes health tracking effortless.
- Secure storage — your health data always belongs to you.
- Developed independently, with no third-party templates or clones.
- Regular updates with new insights and features for your well-being.

Privacy & Responsibility

Vitaria is designed as a wellness companion, not a medical device.
It does not diagnose or treat medical conditions.
For any health concerns, always consult your healthcare professional.

Your data stays private — stored securely on your device and synced safely via HealthKit when enabled.
We never share personal information without your consent.

Terms of Use (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Privacy Policy: https://sites.google.com/view/vitaria-healthcare/privacy-policy

Build better habits with Vitaria – your health, your data, your insight.

Live in sync with your cycle using Flo, the world’s most popular female health app. Get personalised insights and predictions on your body.

Whether you want to predict your period, get pregnant, track your pregnancy, or better understand your symptoms, Flo is your all-in-one female health partner. Join over 420 million members.

With Flo, you can:
- Keep your data safe: Flo is the first period and ovulation tracker to achieve dual ISO 27001 and ISO 27701 Certifications (aka gold standards in data protection).
- Feel more understood: Share your Flo insights via Flo for Partners to feel more connected, understood, and supported.
- Get an extra layer of protection: Anonymous Mode means no one, not even Flo, can identify you based on your health data.
- Join a supportive community: Secret Chats is where members can discuss topics and connect with others on the same journey.
- Access reliable health information: Flo collaborates with a globally recognised organisation dedicated to reproductive health and rights, ensuring trustworthy support for your health journey.

With Flo Premium, you can enjoy:
- Monthly cycle reports
- Symptom predictions and patterns
- Tailored prediction insights
- Detailed pregnancy tracking
- Full access to Flo for Partners
- A 24/7 virtual Health Assistant
- All articles, videos, and courses reviewed by 140+ health experts

New! Flo supports perimenopause:
- Know what might be perimenopause and how to tune in to your body’s changes.
- Get clarity on common perimenopause symptoms and what can help.
- Make more informed health decisions and identify what you need to feel your best.

Start tracking your cycle for free today.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://flo.health/privacy-policy  
https://flo.health/terms-of-use 

Connect with Flo:
Web: flo.health
TikTok: @flotracker
Instagram: @flotracker

Please note: Flo is not a diagnostic tool and should not be used as a method of contraception or to facilitate conception. Predictions and insights provided by the app are intended for informational purposes only and are not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns or decisions.

Flo uses HealthKit to read menstrual cycle data and export your Flo activities to the Health app.

If you have any difficulties using the app, contact Flo via support@flo.health.

Notice of Access Permission:
Flo may request permission for:
- In-app notifications or reminders.
- Uploading photos to specific forum discussions.
- Uploading audio recordings to closed group chats.
Content sharing is entirely optional. Flo does not automatically access your content. You can select what you want to share.

VitalTracker: Your Comprehensive Health & Wellness Companion

Take control of your health journey in one simple app! VitalTracker empowers you to effortlessly monitor, understand, and improve your key health metrics.

Track Your Vital Signs with Ease:
- Measure Heart Rate: Get instant heart rate readings. 
- Record Blood Pressure: Log systolic, diastolic, and pulse consistently.
- Monitor Weight Trends: Track your weight progress over time.
- Visualize Your Data: See clear bar charts for BP and weight, spotting trends at a glance.

Stay Informed & Motivated:
- Access Health Articles: Learn from trusted health and wellness articles and tips.
- Discover Healthy Recipes: Find delicious recipes to support your goals.
- Set Smart Reminders: Never miss a measurement with customizable reminders for BP, weight, and heart rate checks.

Why Choose VitalTracker?
All-in-One Hub: Ditch multiple apps. Track heart rate, BP, weight, access knowledge, and see charts all in one place.
Understand Your Progress: Charts and graphs transform numbers into meaningful insights about your health trends.
Proactive Health Management: Reminders help you stay consistent, making health tracking a seamless habit.
Simple & User-Friendly:Designed for everyone, with an intuitive interface for effortless logging and viewing.
Your Health Journal:Keep a centralized record of your vital signs for better discussions with your doctor.

Download VitalTracker today and make informed decisions for a healthier tomorrow! Start tracking your heart rate, blood pressure, weight, and gain valuable insights with charts, articles, recipes, and reminders.

Perfect for anyone looking to: Monitor blood pressure, track weight loss/gain, understand heart rate trends, manage overall wellness, or simply stay informed about their health.

Disclaimer Statement
Purpose Clarification
VitalTracker provides self-monitoring tools for heart rate, blood pressure and weight trends. All data and articles are for general wellness reference only (not FDA-cleared medical devices).
Professional Guidance
Always seek advice from your physician before making health decisions. Our recipes and educational content are not tailored to individual medical conditions.
Regulatory Notes
- Not intended for diagnosing/treating diseases

Privacy Policy:﻿https://kms.vitaltrackerzz.com/privacyPolicy.html

Blood Pressure Tracker: Your Personal Health Companion

Blood Pressure Tracker is a professional health monitoring and recording application designed to help you easily track, manage, and understand your blood pressure readings. Achieve your health goals with comprehensive daily tracking and accurate determination of your blood pressure zone.

●  Main Features:

- **Smart Blood Pressure Recording:** Effortlessly record daily systolic and diastolic blood pressure readings. Manual input and automatic synchronization from your blood pressure monitor ensure your records are always up-to-date and accurate.
  
- **Charts and Trend Analysis:** Visualize your blood pressure data through intuitive charts and trend analyses, helping you better understand fluctuations and take timely action for your health.
  
- **Health Information on Blood Pressure:** Access valuable articles extracted from the official WHO website to enhance your knowledge about blood pressure, prevention strategies, and healthy living habits.
  
- **Simple and Exquisite UI Design:** Enjoy a user-friendly interface that makes health management easy and accessible.

●  Subscription Service:

Unlock the full potential of our app with a subscription! Choose from weekly, monthly, or yearly plans to enjoy an ad-free experience and easily export your blood pressure records in PDF format.

- **Subscription Details:**
  - Weekly Subscription: $2.99 per week
  - Monthly Subscription: $7.99 per month
  - Yearly Subscription: $19.99 per year

Your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. The account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase.

●  Important Links:

- [Privacy Policy] https://okd.trasbloode.com/privacyPolicy.html
- [Terms of Service] https://okd.trasbloode.com/help.html

● Disclaimer:

Our app provides blood pressure and heart rate recording functions to help you understand your blood pressure trends, aiding in better control. However, please seek professional medical advice in addition to using our app before making any medical decisions. The content in the app is not affiliated with Apple and is intended for reference only.

We wish you a healthy body and a happy mood! Thank you for supporting us, and we look forward to providing you with continuous improvements!

In the fast-paced modern life, health has increasingly become the focus of people's attention. In order to help everyone better manage their own health, we have launched the ACE Blood Pressure Monitor app, which integrates recording of multiple indicators such as blood pressure and blood sugar. We are committed to becoming your caring health management partner.
Our core function: comprehensive protection of health
Accurate data recording
Blood pressure recording: Whether it's basic blood pressure measurement in the morning or irregular daily monitoring, the app provides a convenient entry point for recording. You can manually input measurement values and also support voice input, freeing your hands and making the operation easier. If you are equipped with a Bluetooth smart blood pressure monitor, the data can also be automatically synchronized to ensure that every measurement data is accurately recorded without errors. At the same time, the APP has built-in data review functions for 7 days, 14 days, and 30 days, allowing you to check the trend of blood pressure changes at any time and detect blood pressure fluctuations in a timely manner.
Blood sugar recording: For people who are concerned about their blood sugar health, the app has designed an intuitive and easy-to-use recording interface. Distinguishing between pre - and post meal records can help you analyze the relationship between diet and blood sugar. Similarly, you can conveniently view blood glucose data from different cycles, providing a strong basis for blood glucose management.
Other indicators: In addition to blood pressure and blood sugar, the app also supports recording of health indicators such as heart rate and body temperature, meeting your comprehensive health data management needs.
Data visualization is crucial for understanding health status. The app uses various chart formats such as line charts, bar charts, and pie charts to clearly display your health data from different dimensions. Whether it's the changes in blood pressure within a day or the statistics of blood sugar levels over the course of a month, they can make it clear to you at a glance

Disclaimers
This application cannot be used as a medical device. If you have any health issues, seek medical advice, or make medical decisions, please consult your doctor

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Looking to build muscle and lose weight? Home Workout has got you covered!
Home workouts with no equipment, easy to follow.
Follow the tailored workout plans and expert guidance to meet a fitter, stronger you!

Home Workout app is an expertly crafted fitness app that offers a variety of workouts and workout plans suitable for everyone, from fitness beginners to experts.

With no equipment required, you can start workouts anytime, anywhere– whether you're at home, in the gym, or outdoors.

And that's not all! Home Workout also provides personalized workout plans tailored to your individual needs, whether your aim is to build muscle, lose weight, or simply stay fit.

Plus, with a real-time workout tracker, your training data will be automatically recorded and you'll never miss a single workout progress. So why wait? Time to get ready to transform your body today with Home Workout!

Home Workout prioritizes your fitness goals and workout results.
1. START ANYTIME & ANYWHERE
Our easy-to-follow workouts need no equipment. With Home Workout, just tap and start your workout plan anytime, whether at home, in the gym, or outdoors.

2. EXPERT-TAILORED WORKOUT PLAN
Gain muscle, lose weight, or just keep fit - Home Workout provides a personalized workout plan that exactly fits your goals and lifestyle. And the best part? It's fast-acting and produces long-lasting workout results.

3. WIDE RANGE OF WORKOUTS
Everyone can find the workouts they want here, whether you want to lose fat, target specific muscles, stretch your body, or just get a good mood. Home Workout has got you covered with a variety of targeted workouts.

Get Moving with Home Workout's Highlight Features:
• Personalized Workout Plan just for you: Tailored to your fitness goals & focus areas, and get faster workout results.
• 500+ Varied Workouts: A wide variety of workouts and exercises that cater to your every individual needs.
• Smart Fitness Tracker: Automatically record your workout progress and help you stay on track.

Other Can't-Miss Features:
• Pro Workout Video Guides: Work out effectively, prevent injury, and get inspired.
• Apple Health Integration: Seamlessly integrate your fitness data (calories, steps…) for better workout progress tracking
• Clear Workout Data Charts: Track weight and calorie trends for informed decisions.
• Customized Reminders: Never miss a training session or daily workout goal.
• Share with friends: Inspire and get inspired.

No Hidden Charges, say goodbye to unexpected "surprises".

Subscription Terms and Details
- Get unlimited access to all features for USD $39.99/year.
- The payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase.
- The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- Subscription may be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to Account Settings after purchase.
- The account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

Your heart powers every moment of your life. Heart Health Monitor & Tracker puts advanced heart monitoring, heart rate tracking, and pulse analysis right in your pocket—giving you the tools to take control of your cardiovascular health with ease and precision.

Key Features:
* Real-Time Heart Rate Monitoring Track your heart rate easily using your phone or connected devices with accurate, real-time readings.
* Daily Heart Health Reports Get clear, visual summaries of your heart activity, trends, and overall cardiovascular performance.
* Arrhythmia & Irregular Rhythm Alerts Receive notifications when the app detects signs of irregular heartbeats like AFib or skipped beats.
* Personalized Health Insights Understand your patterns and receive tailored advice based on your unique heart data and trends.
* Apple Health Integration Sync seamlessly with Apple Health and other compatible platforms for a complete health profile.

Why Choose Heart Health Monitor & Tracker? Designed for ease of use and backed by accurate data, this app is ideal for anyone looking to track heart performance, detect potential issues early, and live a heart-healthy life.

Download Heart Health Monitor & Tracker today and take the first step toward better heart health.


Disclaimer:
* Heart Health Monitor & Tracker is not a medical device and should not be used to diagnose heart conditions.
* Heart Health Monitor & Tracker is not intended for use in medical emergencies. Please consult your primary care physician if you require medical assistance.
* Heart Health Monitor & Tracker is NOT INTENDED FOR MEDICAL USE and is designed for fitness and general wellness purposes only.
* Heart Health Monitor & Tracker provides general health information and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
* The app may cause your phone’s LED flash to become very hot during use. Please use with caution.


Upgrade to Premium to remove ads and unlock all features. We offer weekly, monthly, and yearly subscription options, with or without a 3-day free trial.

description:
AI-Powered Workouts That Deliver Real Results!We will customize a 21-day personalized fitness plan for you! Even if you're a complete beginner in fitness, you can easily master the knack and enjoy the fun of working out. With "MuscleMaxme", you can achieve a healthy and fit physique!
● Professionally Customized, Your Exclusive Personal Fitness Course
Everyone's physical condition and fitness expectations are different. "MuscleMaxme" has assembled a team of top fitness experts in the industry. Through advanced algorithms and detailed questionnaire assessments, we will create a unique customized plan for you. Whether you aim to build muscle, lose fat, or maintain your current body shape, we will precisely plan every step of your training journey to ensure that every drop of sweat you shed brings you closer to a better version of yourself.
● Flexible Workouts, Easy Shaping
Daily workouts only take 10 to 15 minutes, so you don't have to endure the boredom and pain of long-hour exercises.
● From Novice to Expert
Whether you're a fitness novice or an experienced professional, you can find suitable courses through our easy-to-understand guidance. Since everyone's fitness level varies, you should choose exercise methods that match your own ability and pace.
● Work out All Parts of the Body
The courses designed by our fitness experts are aimed at helping you achieve your goals. You can choose a full-body workout or focus on specific body parts, making your training more targeted.
"MuscleMaxme" – The ultimate fitness partner exclusively designed for men, taking you on a personalized fitness journey!
This is a video-based learning platform for fitness enthusiasts. With the help of high-definition video tutorials, professional coaches will demonstrate every movement and explain the key points and details in depth. Even if you're at home, you can enjoy professional gym-level guidance. With daily updated training programs, your fitness journey will always be full of novelty and challenges.
"MuscleMaxme" Automatic Renewal Service Instructions
【"MuscleMaxme"】Enjoy multiple privileges, such as intelligent customized plans, professional assessments, and unlimited access to courses.
【Subscription Cycle】
Continuous Monthly Subscription: The subscription cycle is 1 month.
Continuous Six-Month Subscription: The subscription cycle is 6 months.
Continuous Annual Subscription: The subscription cycle is 12 months.
【Subscription Fees】
Subject to the information of in-App Purchase (iAP). For example, the continuous monthly subscription product costs 48 yuan per month, and the continuous annual subscription product costs 188 yuan per year.
【Payment】
After the user confirms the purchase and makes the payment, the amount will be deducted from the iTunes account.
【Auto-renewal】
The "Continuous Monthly / Annual" products support auto-renewal. After the purchase is confirmed, the fee will be deducted from your iTunes account. Unless you cancel the auto-renewal at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription, the subscription will be automatically renewed. Apple will automatically deduct the fee from the iTunes account within 24 hours before the subscription expires. Upon successful payment, the membership validity period will be extended by one cycle.
【Canceling Auto-renewal】
On your Apple iOS device, open the "App Store" --> Click on the Apple account avatar in the upper right corner --> Enter the "Account" section --> Click on "Subscriptions" --> Select "MuscleMaxme" and cancel the subscription.

Your go-to, integrated health and fitness companion. Whether you want to kick-start your fitness life, keep track of your health, or conveniently manage your smart wearable devices, the Huawei Health app has what you're looking for. Keep your data private, or share it with your loved ones, the power's yours. The latest in health and fitness technology, made simple, secure, and easy to use.

Keeps Up with Your Every Move
Keep track of your health journey. Huawei Health records your activity, supporting over 100 different sports, from beginner to advanced levels. See your workout data clearly every step of the way, so you can be sure you're reaching your goals. A wonderful world of fitness at the tip of your fingers.

Run How You Want
A simpler way to run that can benefit anyone. The app is able to record and map out your route as you're running, all while displaying key information so you can stay on target.

An Amazing Journey
Share your health journey with your friends and family. Your outdoor workout routes can be generated into videos with music for you to proudly share. Use Dynamic tracking to create videos to share on social media to inspire yourself and others with your fitness journey.

A New View on Health
See your life in amazing detail with Huawei Health stats. The app keeps records of your heart rate, weight, sleep quality, step count and more. All your data is shown in clear, dynamic graphs so you have a better understanding of your health in a more accessible way.

[health package]
·Synchronize with the weight data in healthkit. When you use the healthy weight data of Huawei mobile phone, this data will be synchronized and recorded in healthkit.
·Synchronize with motion data in healthkit. You can automatically synchronize the exercise data recorded in Huawei health to healthkit. Similarly, Huawei sports health can also obtain the exercise data from healthkit.

developer: CACAO MOBILE SP Z O O
description:
AI Calorie Scanner is the easiest way to track your nutrition and stay in control of your health. Forget about typing meals manually—just take a photo of your food, and our advanced AI will instantly recognize ingredients, estimate calories, and provide a full nutritional breakdown.

With AI Calorie Scanner, you’ll get accurate insights into your daily intake of calories, proteins, fats, and carbohydrates, helping you make smarter food choices. Whether you want to lose weight, build muscle, or simply maintain a balanced diet, our app adapts to your goals and gives you the data you need to succeed.

Key features:

Instant food recognition – snap a photo, and the app does the rest.

Accurate calorie estimates – powered by cutting-edge AI technology.

Detailed nutrition info – proteins, fats, carbs, and more.

Progress tracking – monitor your daily, weekly, and monthly stats.

Personalized goals – adjust your targets to fit your lifestyle.

Simple and intuitive interface – designed for everyday use.

AI Calorie Scanner saves you time and removes the hassle of logging meals manually. It’s like having a nutritionist in your pocket—always ready to help you stay on track and motivated. Whether you’re an athlete, a fitness enthusiast, or just someone who cares about healthy eating, AI Calorie Scanner will make your journey easier and more enjoyable.

Take the guesswork out of eating. Download AI Calorie Scanner today and start building healthier habits with the power of AI.Terms of Use - https://caloriescannerai.com/terms-of-use.html

Disclaimer
The information provided in this app is for general informational and educational purposes only and is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or another qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition, diet, or health objectives. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read in this app.

Additional Subscription Information:

• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
• Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
• You can manage your subscription by going to your Account Settings on the App Store after purchase.

Whether you are trying to lose weight, gain muscle mass, rounder buttocks or want to get 6-pack abs – our fitness app offers full body workout plans with many 3D workout exercises for free. Here you will find ready workouts with champions’ diets.
You can choose from a variety of exercise plans for muscle groups, such as chest workout or arm workout, or for a certain goal, such as fat burning workout. You can also choose between workout for women, workout for men and get ready workouts with diet.
This fitness application beats other fitness apps, because you can keep your personal workout diary and find the best personal coach from any city for online fitness workouts and bodybuilding sessions. Share your progress, ask questions about workouts, exercises and diet – you will get competent answers. Together you can keep fit at home!

Main advantages of Fitness Online:
-	Ready workouts with a diet plan created by bodybuilding champions who act as coaches.
-	Workout diary: Record your progress with our workout tracker, diet tracker and fitness tracker!
-	In-App Encyclopaedia: Learn more about exercises and diet.
-	Over 850 exercises with high-quality 3D animations.
-	Diet plan: Over 5000 food products with nutrition facts, calorie counter and food tracker.
-	Sports nutrition: Essential additives to your diet for fast muscle building (gain weight).
-	Personal feed: Share workouts, ask questions, meet other users of our community.
-	Direct message our coaches using the in-app chat. Send tips to your friends on how to lose weight, get perfect abs, workout arms and chest, maintain a healthy diet or get a rounder butt through the best buttock exercises.
How does it work?
As a fitness user you can work out by developing your own weight loss program from the exercise library, use our calorie tracker and nutrition guide to create a diet plan and start working out. You can track results in the workout diary. Or choose a ready training program with a diet for your goal, like lifting weights workout, fat loss workout, etc.
You want more? Hire and work out online with a personal coach. Choose your personal trainer by budget and feedback, contact them and set sports goals. Get an invoice, pay with your bank card and start your exercises. 
Your coach will give you a workout plan with individual diet instructions, create a monthly course with a full set of exercises and meal plan to reach your goal, whether that is to get a bigger butt, lose weight, lose belly fat, build muscles, get six-pack abs, get a shredded body, get big arms or a wide chest or get fit after a pregnancy – all with fitness at home.
With a monthly course, such as a weight loss program, your coach will monitor your results for a monthly fee, give advice on your form or meal plan and adjust the exercise program if needed. 
We only invite the best fitness coaches to Fitness Online with knowledge on all working out goals, like trying to get a rounder butt at home, lose weight fast, get six-pack abs, get big arms, get a wide back, build muscles or just define your body.

Having technical issues? Tell us your account name and describe your problem at: support@fitnessonline.app

“We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act but a habit”, This quote from Aristotle goes to the heart of our philosophy. We believe establishing good daily habits and healthy routines are necessary to thrive. This is what we aim to achieve: to help our users develop good habits and daily routines, like following a morning exercise routine or tidying their rooms, and to consistently repeat those actions until they become habits integrated into their lifestyle. This will enable people to lead a wholesome and fulfilling life.

Of course, accessibility is important. This is why Me+ now provides a daily routine planner and self-care schedule to establish a healthy habit and help with your daily routine. By repeating good actions daily and following your planner and self-care schedule, you will gain a new outlook, confidence, and strength. Obstacles that seemed unsurpassable will soon be overcome and forgotten.

Enjoy and utilize our self-care systems:
· Daily Routine Planner and Habit Tracker
· Mood and Progress Tracker

The systems in our app make it easier to seize the day and begin self-development by planning your daily routines and habits.

Here are some great things you can do with the new daily routine features:
-Create your own daily and morning routines.
-Track your self-care plan, daily habits, mood, and progress daily.
-Set friendly reminders in your daily planner for your to-do list.
-Get comprehensive evidence-based self-care information on establishing habits and healthy routines.

Potential benefits of Me+:
-Boosts energy: Exercise, healthy eating, and sleep habits in your Me+ daily planner energize your body and provide motivation for self-care.
-Improves mood: relieve stress and increase happiness through your daily healthy habits and routines.
-Increases focus: Sleep habits and nutritious food improve your concentration, productivity, and motivation.

Build your own self-care schedule and daily routine planner with the icons and colors you choose! Record your daily goals, habits, mood, and more in your Me+ app to celebrate the success and growth of your healthy routines!

HOW TO START SELF-CARE:
-Use the professional Me+ planning template and daily habit tracker: Take the MBTI test to find the routine and habits that suit you best.
-Find a role model: Set a goal to become the person you aspire to be through developing habits and daily self-care routines

Tens of millions of self-care advocates choose Me+ to improve physical and mental health, promote weight loss, experience anti-aging benefits, and more through developing healthy daily habits and self-care routines. Fill your days with self-care habits and meet your best self! Don’t wait for tomorrow; start your healthy routines today!

Subscription Information:
Me+ offers an auto-renewing subscription at $39.99/year and $9.99/month to provide you with unlimited access to the VIP features. Your payment will be charged to your iTunes Account as soon as you confirm your purchase. You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal from your Account Settings after the purchase. Your subscription will renew automatically unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. The cost of renewal will be charged to your account in 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. When canceling a subscription, your subscription will stay active until the end of the period. Why did you choose us?

ARBloodPressure:Health record can easily record and analyze your health data, including but not limited to blood pressure, heart rate, weight, blood sugar, etc. We also provide icon curve function, allowing you to observe your own health trends

Main functions:

1. Record blood pressure: Our application supports users to record their blood pressure indicators, ensuring that you can clearly see your blood pressure health status in the first time

2. View your blood pressure trend: We use intuitive charts to allow you to clearly see their rising/falling blood pressure trends and stay informed about your physical health status in a timely manner

3. Record blood sugar: You can easily and quickly record your blood sugar levels using our application
4. Record heart rate: Our application also supports the function of recording heart rate. You can use our product to record your heart rate, track it at any time, and maintain your health status

5. Information reminder: We also support information reminder function, and you can set your own information reminder time. After setting reminders, it ensures accurate recording of their health indicators every day

6. Record body temperature: Our application supports you to record your own body temperature. After recording your temperature, we will generate a smart chart for you to see your temperature more clearly

This application cannot be used as a medical device. If you have any health issues, seek medical advice, or make medical decisions, please consult your doctor

WalkBoost is your ultimate companion on the journey to fitness and well-being! Transform every step into a celebration of progress, and let us inspire you to achieve your goals while connecting with a vibrant community of fellow walkers.

Why WalkBoost?
Real-Time Tracking: Experience the thrill of seeing your steps, calories burned, walking distance, and exercise time in real-time. Your progress is just a tap away, empowering you to stay on track and motivated throughout your day!
Daily & Weekly Insights: Set your sights high! With detailed insights on your activity, you can push your limits and crush your fitness goals like never before. Monitor your performance and celebrate your successes along the way.


Collect Energy XP: Turn your hard work into Energy XP! Collect Energy EXP by hitting daily goals and completing fun tasks that help build healthy habits. Every step gets you closer to a healthier, happier you!


Redeem for Gift Cards: Exciting news! You can now redeem your collected Energy EXP for gift cards to popular platforms like Visa, Amazon, and PayPal, available in over 200 countries. Treat yourself to something special as a reward for your dedication!


Compete and Rise Through the Ranks: Join a community of go-getters! Track your daily Energy EXP, engage in friendly competition, and climb the ranks as you motivate each other to new heights. Celebrate achievements together and inspire one another to reach new milestones.

Join the WalkBoost Revolution!
At WalkBoost, we believe that every step is a step toward a better you. Let’s make fitness fun and rewarding! Whether you’re walking for health, competition, or just to enjoy the journey, you’ll find the support and motivation you need right here.

Download WalkBoost Now!
Turn your steps into a powerful force for change. With WalkBoost, every stride not only propels you toward your fitness goals but also rewards you with exciting benefits. Together, we can build healthier habits and achieve greatness—one step at a time! Join us and start your journey to a healthier, happier you today!

Pulse Analysis is your one-stop health assistant, designed to help you monitor your heart rate, calculate BMI, track hydration and perform guided breathing exercises. With real-time data and personalized insights, you can take control of your health anytime, anywhere. Whether it's managing weight, improving fitness results, or reducing stress, Pulse Analysis makes it simple and efficient. Download now to start your health journey!

Main features:

Real-time heart rate monitoring, recording blood pressure at all times

BMI calculation and analysis

Body hydration tracking

Guided breathing exercises to help you relax

Cancellation & Management  
Cancellation Timing: You may cancel your subscription at any time, but cancellations must be made at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period (or trial period) to avoid being charged for the next cycle.  
How to Manage/ Cancel: Subscriptions are managed directly through your Apple account. To turn off auto-renewal or cancel:  
  1. Open the Settings app on your iPhone.

  3. Select "Subscriptions" from the menu.

Introduction to our Blood pressure app - a must-have tool for tracking and analyzing blood pressure records. Through our user-friendly interface, users can easily record and monitor their blood pressure readings, helping them to keep abreast of their health status.

Main features:
1. Record blood pressure readings: Our app allows users to easily record their blood pressure readings, ensuring an accurate and up-to-date record of their health status.

2. Analyze blood pressure trends: With intuitive charts and graphs, users can easily track blood pressure trends over time. This feature enables individuals to recognize patterns and make informed decisions about their health.

3. Health information and tips: Our app not only tracks blood pressure, but also provides a wealth of health information and tips to help users live a healthier lifestyle. Stay up to date and motivated with our carefully selected content on nutrition, exercise, stress management and more.

4. Personalized Reminders: Never miss a blood pressure reading with our personalized reminders. Set reminders to ensure timely measurements throughout the day and promote continuous monitoring of blood pressure.

5. Secure and private: Protecting user data is our top priority. Our app ensures the privacy and security of all sensitive information, allowing users to track their blood pressure with confidence.

The disclaimer states:

Any health advice provided by this app does not constitute professional medical advice. For any health concerns, we recommend that you consult a professional doctor or medical institution.

Playbook is one of the top fitness apps on the market where you can support your favorite creators directly. THE MAJORITY OF YOUR SUBSCRIPTION GOES DIRECTLY TO THE PEOPLE CREATING THE WORKOUTS AND CLASSES YOU LOVE. Get access to the world’s leading fitness influencers, trainers, wellness gurus, athletes, and more all on your phone. With over 56,000 workouts and more than 500 instructors, there is something for everyone to achieve health and wellness goals. Take Playbook with you to the gym; workout at home and even while traveling — with the ability to download workouts you can sweat any time, anywhere.

Premium features:
• Join a community of motivated individuals to help reach your goals 
• Communicate directly with your favorite creators
• Get daily workouts and access to programs and challenges (with prizes)
• Wellness guides for the full experience: Nutrition, supplements, recipes, mindset, productivity, and more 
• Unlimited offline downloads, plus stream to other devices
• Favorite workouts, schedule classes, and track your progress
• Live streaming classes to workout with instructors in real time
• Your subscription money supports your favorite creators directly
• Compatible with Apple health 

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING & TERMS
Playbook is free to download and includes a 7-day free trial period to unlock access to the entire platform, including all instructors, workouts, programs, and videos.
After trial period there are two subscription options:

$14.99/month
$99.99/year

These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence. Your iTunes account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. If you subscribe before your free trial ends, the rest of your free trial period will be forfeited as soon as your purchase is confirmed.

Your Playbook subscription will automatically renew unless turned off in your iTunes Account Settings at least 24 hours before current period ends. You can go to your iTunes Account settings to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew.
